DOC.brief_summary: The trial will evaluate the effects of aerobic exercise in patients undergoing chemotherapy for the treatment of a hematological neoplastic disease.
DOC.brief_title: Exercise During Chemotherapy for Patients With Hematological Malignancies
DOC.criteria: Hematological malignant disease Current chemotherapy Understanding of written German Cardiorespiratory, metabolical, osteoarticular or immunological disorders which can be aggravated by exercise Pathological stressECG at recruitment
